protein.specific_function: Has 2-hydroxyacid oxidase activity. Most active on the 2-carbon substrate glycolate, but is also active on 2-hydroxy fatty acids, with high activity towards 2-hydroxy palmitate and 2-hydroxy octanoate.

reference.reference_text: Williams E, Cregeen D, Rumsby G: Identification and expression of a cDNA for human glycolate oxidase. Biochim Biophys Acta. 2000 Sep 7;1493(1-2):246-8.
